title: how to pin extensions to task bar

creator: winfour

title: I have updated wrong password
content: Hello, unfortunately I have updated wrong password. I was visiting a site and it forced me to change password. So I let Mozilla auto-generate one and clicked update. The password however didn't match their requirements. So now I am stuck with Mozilla that has updated password in its and the site that requires the old one. Luckily I can see that there is file called "logins-backup.json" in my AppData directory. I have no idea how to access it and restore it though. I tried copying or renaming the file, but windows keep saying I don't have permissions to do that(even though I am owner of the file). Is there any way to restore the old password? Thank you.
creator: vavra.pepa
